benchmark_details.name: TCMD (Traditional Chinese Medicine QA Dataset for Evaluating Large Language Models)
benchmark_details.overview: TCMD is a new medical question-answering (QA) dataset that contains massive manual instruction for solving Traditional Chinese Medicine examination tasks, aimed at comprehensively assessing the capability of large language models in the TCM domain.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the capability of different LLMs in solving TCM tasks using a dataset that adheres to the style of the Chinese National Medical Licensing Examination.

data.source: Questions are collected from reference books and Traditional Chinese Medicine enthusiasts, including actual examinations from different years.
data.annotation: Manually verified and processed for correctness

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated based on the correct answers given by the models on the test set.
methodology.interpretation: Good performance is indicated by achieving over 60% accuracy on the multiple-choice questions.
methodology.baseline_results: Models tested include General LLMs, Common Medical LLMs, and TCM-domain-specific LLMs, with varying accuracy results.
methodology.validation: The dataset has been validated through manual verification and checking of the questions by medical experts.
